tasks.task: Implement Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) for rice cultivation in Vietnam.
subtasks: Develop sustainable resource management techniques for rice farming.
Collaborate with the Vietnamese government and provincial authorities.
Apply natural resource management technologies from the irrigated rice research consortium.
Reduce resource usage through the "five reductions, one must do" initiative.
